text: Jung-dong Station () is a station on the Busan Metro Line 2 in Jung-dong, Haeundae District, Busan, South Korea. ==External links== * Cyber station information from Busan Transportation Corporation Category:Busan Metro stations Category:Haeundae District Category:Railway stations opened in 2002 Category:2002 establishments in South Korea
title: Jung-dong station (Busan Metro)
